author: Miller Kern
title: How to get toiletries without going to the drugstore
description: Going anywhere during the coronavirus outbreak has risks, but a pharmacy is especially questionable. Even though sick people are instructed to not leave the house at all, some might still be hitting up the pharmacy to get medicine. You want to avoid this. You…
content:
